snippet: A close circle of friends, relatives, associates, colleagues from the security services and longtime advisers have grown fabulously wealthy during Vladimir V. Putin’s 12 years as Russia’s paramount leader.
abstract: Select members of Vladimir V Putin's close circle of friends and colleagues have grown fabulously wealthy during his 12 years as Russia’s paramount leader; critics say these relationships are evidence of deeply entrenched corruption, which they view as essentially government-sanctioned theft invariably connected to Russia’s abundant natural resources; this has become a persistent grievance of demonstrators who have staged four large street protests since December.

byline.original: By ANDREW E. KRAMER and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN
byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer reported from St. Petersburg, and David M. Herszenhorn from Moscow. Anastasia Sadovskaya contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: A close circle of friends, relatives, associates, colleagues from the security services and longtime advisers have grown fabulously wealthy during Vladimir V. Putin’s 12 years as Russia’s paramount leader.

headline.seo: Midas Touch: Those With Putin Ties Glow Brightly
headline.main: Midas Touch in St. Petersburg: Friends of Putin Glow Brightly
headline.print_headline: Midas Touch in St. Petersburg: Friends of Putin Glow Brightly
